description: Palmolive Luminous Oils Hair Conditioner Rose Petal Oil & Bamboo helps restore & renew your hair.Palmolive Luminous Oils Hair Conditioner Rose Petal Oil and Bamboo helps restore and renew your hair. Infused with natural rose petal oil and bamboo extract, this Palmolive Luminous Oils Hair Care Conditioner formula works to wrap around and moisturise each hair strand for rejuvenated, soft, naturally beautiful hair.Restore and revitalise your hair and enjoy the uplifting fragrance. A spritz of perfume for your hair, luxurious Rose Oil is blended perfectly with fruity notes of orange and cassis and rounded out with warm Sandalwood and Amber notes.Contains: - No Parabens- No Phthalates- No Alcohol- No Soap- No GlutenDirections: After shampooing, massage through wet hair and comb through. For Best Results: Use with Palmolive Luminous Oils Rose Petal and Bamboo Shampoo.Size: 350mL BottlePALMOLIVE LUMINOUS OILS HAIR CONDITIONER: is infused with Rose Petal Oil and Bamboo ExtractRESTORE AND RENEW: Hair conditioner formula works to wrap around and moisturise each hair strand for rejuvenated, soft, naturally beautiful hair.FRESH UPLIFTING FRAGRANCE: A spritz of perfume for your hair, luxurious Rose Oil is blended perfectly with fruity notes of orange and cassis and rounded out with warm Sandalwood and Amber notes.FREE FROM: No Parabens, Phthalates, Alcohol, Gluten and SoapDAILY USE: Suitable for daily use
name: Palmolive Luminous Oils Rose Petal Oil & Bamboo Renew Hair Conditioner 350mL
